readable.title: 3583293892_c96af8cd98
readable.content: A baseball pitcher in a red and white uniform throws the ball while his teammate watches . A baseball pitcher on the mound leaning into his pitch . A pitcher throwing a ball at a baseball game A pitcher with a red shirt is throwing a ball and his teammate is waiting to catch near a base . Baseball is being played by two men in red jerseys by a " pepco " sign .
